saao/saa05/P334092
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-re-ṣu-u-a lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ {KUR}gu-ri-a-ni-a {KUR}na-gi-u₂ bir-te {KUR}URI bir-te {KUR}ga-mir-ra šu-u₂ ma-da-at-tu₂ a-na {KUR}URI-a.a i-da-an a-ki-i {KUR}URI-a.a ina UGU {KUR}ga-mir-ra il-lik-u-ni a-ki-i a-bi-ik-tu₂ ina ŠA₃ {KUR}URI-a.a ta-aš₂-ša₂-ki-nu-ni {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ a-mar TA@v ma-ka in-na-su-x-ni ina {KUR}gu-ri-a-ni-a o an-ni-u₂ am-mu-te x x x x am-mu-te i-ṣa-bat x+x x x x x x i-šak-kan ki-i LUGAL {KUR}URI-a.a TA@v ŠA₃ {LU₂}KUR₂-šu x x x x x ina pa-an KASKAL-šu x x x x x an-nu-te u₂-x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ki-x x x x x x x x x x ša il-x x x x x x x x x 08 lim {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ x x x x x ku-pu ni ki x x x {LU₂}NAM-MEŠ {KUR}URI-a.a ša ina ŠA₃ x x x x ina UGU LUGAL {KUR}URI-a.a it-tal-ku {LU₂}NAM-MEŠ an-nu-te x x x x x x ina ŠA₃ IGI.2-MEŠ ša LUGAL x x x x {URU}HAL.ṢU-MEŠ x x x x x x x LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi x x x x x i-tal-lak an-nu-x+x x x x x x x {LU₂}A-KIN-MEŠ {LU₂}A-KIN-MEŠ il-lu-ku x x x ina UGU-hi-šu₂-nu ra-x+x x+x x a-du zi-bu-tu₂ x x x-u-ni ina UGU-hi-šu₂-nu ṭe₃-e-mu ša LUGAL ina {URU}ṭu-ur-uš-pa-a šu-u₂
